review_body: Wonderful and awesome app, helped me in grooming my career, hope it will help me in future to achieve the great heights. App is super for applying and searching jobs. I have a small suggestion it would be helpful if there is a continuous follow up from recruiter like notifying the recruiter about applicants and also a courtesy reply would be great ex: job is filled, require more skills, interview ongoing etc. The appl...Full ReviewApp is super for applying and searching jobs. I have a small suggestion it would be helpful if there is a continuous follow up from recruiter like notifying the recruiter about applicants and also a courtesy reply would be great ex: job is filled, require more skills, interview ongoing etc. The application status remains same for months together which doesn't look good for naukri. If updated this would stand apart from other market players
